title: You're favorite anime character is now in League of Legends;
body:
You read the title, come on.

Mine would be either Gaara from Naruto({{champion:268}} + {{champion:33}} ?), or Death the Kid from Soul Eater (a more badass {{champion:236}} ?)

EDIT: Your*

ANOTHER EDIT: Ideas for skin concepts can work, too!

replies.body:
Oooo I love Soul Eater!

I think mine would have to be Touka from Tokyo Ghoul. She'd be some sort of mobile assassin similar to {{champion:103}}

Light Yagami from Death Note!

Q-Writes a champion's name in his death note, instantly killing any enemy champion.
W-Eats a potato chip, allaying all his enemies suspicions and making himself untargetable.
E-Channels, then controls an enemy champion for 20 seconds, instantly killing them at the end of it.
R-Writes a summoner's name in the death note, dc'ing them and getting them banned for afk. :)
Light got snared, but he ate a chip so he was k.
Holo the wise Wolf! ^-^. I love her so much!. (Anime: Spice and Wolf)

Okay Elizabeth (Persona series), time to bring down the OP.

Elizabeth, She Who Governs Power

**Passive: Velvet Siphon** -- Whenever Elizabeth deals damage to a crowd-controlled enemy champion, she restores some mana.

**Q: Shuffle Time** -- Elizabeth's next autoattack deals bonus magic damage and will have one of three effects randomly apply:
*Zapped* -- the enemy's movement speed is impaired by 20% for 1.5 seconds
*Rattled* -- the enemy takes (scaling-with-level) additional magic damage from all sources for 1.5 seconds; counts as a fear effect
*Enervated* -- the enemy is silenced for 1.5 seconds

**W: Hamaon** -- Elizabeth invokes the persona Uriel to strike with a bolt of searing light from the sky after a short delay. Enemies in the area take magic damage and are blinded.

**E: Ghastly Wail** -- Elizabeth summons Thanatos a short distance from herself, who screams in a cone in front of him. The screech deals magic damage to all enemies. Enemies under fear effects take double damage and are stunned.

**R: Megidolaon** -- Elizabeth targets a large spot on the map from anywhere (similar to {{champion:80}} 's ult in radius) and channels for 4 seconds as the force of Almighty magic conspicuously descends. Upon its arrival, enemies in the area take massive true damage. If Elizabeth is interrupted, nothing happens.

If people like this I could add more.
But {{champion:37}} is already in this game...

> [{quoted}](name=Hellioning,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=FO1dkNry,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2015-02-09T19:16:09.737+0000)
>
> But {{champion:37}} is already in this game...

but she's not an anime character??
I think Hatsune Miku, the vocaloid who's design is extremely similar to sona's.
But she is not an anime character really either, I think?
Kamina...No champion in this game comes close to how badass Kamina is.

Either Mikasa from Attack on Titan

or L from Death Note. Those would be interesting.
L = Eats a piece of cake and becomes fully healed, debuffed, and invulnerable.
Mikasa = Yasuo + *more mobility*

http://needcoffee.cachefly.net/needcoffee/uploads/2008/08/ranma-digital-dojo-3.jpg
"Lately, he seems to prefer to be a panda."

Would buy, especially if he came with his theme music.

Pharaoh Atem from Yu-Gi-Oh!
{{champion:4}} + {{champion:268}}

Motoko Kusanagi, the Cyborg Major

Origin: Ghost in the Shell (Stand Alone Complex/1995 movie combination)

Role: Marksman/Assassin

General Concept: Major Kusanagi is all about maneuvering and striking at the perfect moment for maximum impact, all the while sowing discord among the enemy ranks. She approaches operations with controlled and calculated measures, almost never losing her cool. As an ADC, she'd be very defensive for her role, allowing the enemy to come to her before springing her trap.

Passive: Espionage: When out of combat for more than five seconds, the Major can move through minions and remain undetected by them

Q: Passive: When standing still for two seconds, Motoko gains armor penetration. Active: Seburo Burst: The Major flips to full auto, increasing her attack speed for several seconds.

W(1): Tactical Cloak: The Major cloaks for five seconds and prepares to line up the perfect shot. For three seconds afterwards, Motoko gains 20% bonus damage.

W(2): Cyborg Assault: The Major makes a large, inhuman leap to begin her assault. For several seconds after she lands, Motoko gains 20% bonus damage.

E: HV Rounds: The Major loads High Velocity ammo into her Seburo SMG and opens fire on the enemy. Every second of sustained fire pushes her back one Teemo. She is immobile during this time unless the skill is ended early, and her aim follows the mouse. Enemies hit by projectiles are slowed 5% for two seconds, and the effect stacks with each successive hit. When the stacks reach 50%, the target is stunned for 1 second. Scales with attack speed.

R: Brainjack: The Major uses her Wizard-class hacking skills to their fullest extent. The target champion receives enormous damage and is slowed. If there are nearby enemy champions, the target only receives half, but begins attacking their allies for several seconds, and are briefly rendered immune to crowd control, buffs and heals.
How can a native english speaker confuse "you're" with "your" is beyond me.

> [{quoted}](name=Solaxo,realm=EUNE,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=FO1dkNry,comment-id=0028,timestamp=2015-02-10T08:57:12.842+0000)
>
> How can a native english speaker confuse "you're" with "your" is beyond me.

lol. That's actually quite common in America. Even a lot of the average Americans confuse "your, you're, two, to, and too".

But I'm Canadian. ;-;
Us Canadians have a high potential to live up to!!

~~Us~~ We Canadians have...

(I could have been more picky about your  having ended a sentence with a preposition, but I'm in a good mood.)
Canadians OP like that, eh
Someone already pointed that out, and I'm still heartbroken that I didn't even notice.
>How ~~can~~ a native english speaker **CAN** confuse "you're" with "your" is beyond me.
I'd like an Alex Louis Armstrong skin for {{champion:201}}. Bonus points if he quotes the Avarosan family bloodline.
A facebook page uploaded an amazing fan art of what that would be like, and it was amazing! I think it also had Nautilus as Al and Ezreal as Ed. :D

The battousai..but ive never played yasuo only Master YI.

Close second would be yamamoto(and the rest of the vongola family) 5 guys running around in debonair skins

Homura from Puella Magi Madoka Magica, basically a mix of {{champion:26}} and {{champion:222}} but calmer.

**Passive - Retry**: When Homura dies, she respawns immediately, bypassing the usual respawn timer. This passive has a 4 minute cooldown.

**Q - Adapt**: Homura can switch weapons between a pistol (crit chance), a shotgun (armor pen), and a machine gun (attack speed).

**W - Skip**: Homura briefly halts the flow of time, granting her a very brief period of invulnerability along with a massive speed boost.

**E - Endure**: Homura uses her shield to block incoming damage, up to a moderate cap.

**Ultimate - Destroy**: Homura unleashes her full arsenal of weapons towards a target area. While she remains channeling (up to 2 seconds), champions in that area are heavily slowed. Once Homura finishes channeling, the projectiles and explosives go off, dealing more damage the longer she spent channeling.
Sailor saturn, blows up the game as soon as the game starts.

Well...does the entire crew of Gurren Lagann count if they're all inside of the Tengen Toppa Gurren Lagann? If so then I want that. Maybe he could be like a Cho'gath, where everytime he levels his ult up he fuses with the next thing to make a bigger Gurren, until he becomes a huge galaxy-throwing robot fueled by raw awesomeness and Spiral energy.

Haruhi Suzumiya from The Melancholy of Haruhi Suzumiya
Don't know what she would be like though I know she would need to have a taunt towards ezreal
I'm sorry:  "*Your*"
OHNO. Thanks for poining that out now...
I can't help but notice these things, but unfortunately it's too late to change it.
Adam Blade and Vash the stampede. Nuff said.

Lelouch from Code Geass.

First 3 abilities say snarky remarks. His ultimate forces all the other champions in the game to do whatever he says, including killing their own Nexus.

Seems legit?
{{champion:55}} as Yuno Gasai from Mirai Nikki
Darkwing duck. Cause thats totally an anime.

Shana from Shakugan No Shana... Still one of my favorites :)

{{champion:157}} +{{champion:63}}

Edward Elric 

Passive Equivalent exchange. First auto attack steals 7/12/18/25 flat armor and adds to total armor for 8 seconds. Refreshed on every auto attack but can only have one champion armor at a time. upgraded with ultimate
Q.  Metal Arm- When toggled increases attack damage by 10/15/20/25/30 (plus 15%% armor). Costs 20% of Edwards current armor
W. Metal leg-Quickly kicks enemy, silencing them briefly and doing damage (counts as auto attack) resets auto attack
E. Tremor Uses alchemy on the ground, creating a tremor in a line that moves forward, rooting and damaging the first champion it hits.
R. Summon Alphonse- Alphonse's armor is transmuted out of the ground. with 125% of edwards armor magic resist and 1200/2100/3000 health, but 70% of his damage. Edwards empowering auto attack moves also empower alphonse's by the same amount. And Alphonse has a passive which steals half of that which edwards normally would and gives it to edward.

> [{quoted}](name=Beowwulf,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=FO1dkNry,comment-id=001f,timestamp=2015-02-10T03:07:03.187+0000)
>
> Edward Elric 
> 
> Passive Equivalent exchange. First auto attack steals 7/12/18/25 flat armor and adds to total armor for 8 seconds. Refreshed on every auto attack but can only have one champion armor at a time. upgraded with ultimate
> Q.  Metal Arm- When toggled increases attack damage by 10/15/20/25/30 (plus 15%% armor). Costs 20% of Edwards current armor
> W. Metal leg-Quickly kicks enemy, silencing them briefly and doing damage (counts as auto attack) resets auto attack
> E. Tremor Uses alchemy on the ground, creating a tremor in a line that moves forward, rooting and damaging the first champion it hits.
> R. Summon Alphonse- Alphonse's armor is transmuted out of the ground. with 125% of edwards armor magic resist and 1200/2100/3000 health, but 70% of his damage. Edwards empowering auto attack moves also empower alphonse's by the same amount. And Alphonse has a passive which steals half of that which edwards normally would and gives it to edward.

I would give him the passive "Seen the gate" which allows half of his cooldown reduction to apply to summoner spells. I like this!

Kazuma Kuwabara, the Psychic Swordsman

Origin: Yu Yu Hakusho

Role: Tank/Fighter

General Concept: Kazuma Kuwabara has an abnormally high amount of spirit awareness and potential to mutate and adapt it to whatever situation arises. At the same time, he's a brute and a hothead that can withstand a world of punishment. His fighting style is highly adaptive, but unrefined, so his abilities would not focus too much around being clever or highbrow; like Trundle, his greatest strength would be to hit something until it doesn't work. Despite his thuggish attitude, Kuwabara is extremely goofy and softhearted, and his spirit powers are closely tied to his emotions, so he should be encouraged to fight around teammates. No real good ideas here.

Passive: Knight in Shining Armor: Kuwabara cares for his friends and gains power from their presence. Kuwabara gains 5 armor, magic resist, and his base healing is increased by 15% for each nearby ally. If they are below 30% HP, this bonus is doubled.

Q: Spirit Sword: Kuwabara manifests his spirit energy into a physical weapon. His attack damage increases by 10/15/20/25/30 for the duration the Spirit Sword is out, but it constantly drains mana.

W: Sword, Get Long!: Kuwabara uses his Spirit Sword as a makeshift pole vault, launching himself into the air. Enemies around the impact are displaced and slowed. The range increases when moving towards enemies or allies, but the minimum vault length should be long enough to move through thin walls.

E: Passive:  Kuwabara senses danger, even if he can't see it coming. For a range of 1000 units, Kuwabara can sense all enemy champion movement for three seconds, but it does not provide vision.

R: I got nothing.

Kirito from SAO (not my fav but this was fun x3)
Passive- Gets 5 sec after dying to attempt to kill his killer (can only damage killer)
Q (toggle)- Can start using 2nd sword, causing him to be able to double attack
W- Eats sandwich made by Asuna, healing him a small amount and removing debuffs
E (passive)- Damaging targets gives a chance to mark them as a target for Knights of Blood, causing teammates to deal extra damage while the debuff is on, once the debuff is taken advantage of once it's removed
R- Dashes forward to a location, dealing damage to any unit passed within melee aa range, marking them as targets for the Knights of Blood

Vegeta...

Every single one of you are screwed. I will destroy the whole Summoner's Rift in the blink of an eye. DO YOU KNOW WHO I AM!!! I'M THE PRINCE OF ALL SAYIANS 
AND YOU WILL BOW DOWN OR BE OBLITERATED!!!!!!!!!

{{champion:5}} Sion must have gotten a buff...
{{champion:11}} Psst. Like that'll help.

Killua from Hunter x Hunter

....oh wait {{champion:85}}
Okay, new idea: Alex Louis Armstrong, the Strong Arm Alchemist, and {{champion:201}}'s new best friend!

Moroha Haimura From world break: aria curse for a holyswordsman (Also known as Seiken Tsukai no world break)

I would imagine he's a mix of yasuo with garen.

He's fast, smart, and strong, but he also cares about integrity and honor.
I'm disappointed no one suggested Sosuke Aizen from Bleach.
Hayato from Kenichi, The World's Mightiest Disciple joins the League of Legends...and you thought {{champion:64}} was broken.
